attributes.action: Reinstate Pork to our Primary schools menus
attributes.additional_details:
We are gathering a petition to pressure the Government to overturn their decision to ban pork in our primary schools.

Parents or governors have never been consulted about this decision.

Its been on our school menus for over 150 years.

And their is NO health reason for taking this off our menus.

This also has a knock on affect on our farming industry, as less Pork is needed.

We need your support. We need to take a stand with political correctness and it starts right here!

Please sign and share
